arguments.description: The text that will be wrapped.
arguments.name: text

arguments.description: The maximum width in pixels of each line that text is allowed before wrapping.
arguments.name: wraplimit

returns.description: The maximum width of the wrapped text.
returns.name: width

returns.description: A sequence containing each line of text that was wrapped.
returns.name: wrappedText

shortDescription:
Gets formatting information for text, given a wrap limit.

This function accounts for newlines correctly (i.e. '\n').
